types.html:
laisser tranquille

  1. (transitive) to leave alone, to leave in peace, to leave be
    Synonyms: foutre la paix, lâcher la grappe
    Pourquoi est-ce que je me suis attendu à ce que vous ayez la gentillesse de me laisser tranquille ?
    Why did I ever expect that you would be kind enough to leave me alone?
trans: to leave alone, to leave in peace, to leave be
to leave alone, to leave in peace, to leave be

title: laisser tranquille
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /lɛ.se tʁɑ̃.kil/ ~ /le.se tʁɑ̃.kil/
